abstract.t: This draft defines a layer-2 API in C-language for IP paging.API is presented in the form of callback functions. Whenevera significant event takes place in layer-2, upper layers arenotified using triggers, which can be implemented usingcallback functions. Network and upper layer protocols can usethese callbacks to fine tune layer-3 protocols. Paging APIdefines callback functions for dormant mode relatedinformation, sent from layer-2 to layer-3. API also defines aset of attributes, which define static properties of theunderlying network. Each layer-2 technology may use thishierarchy to specify its properties and limitations.
